name: Plo Koon (V)
Lore: 'Kel Dor Jedi Council member descended from a long line of Jedi. Known for exceptional sensory skills, Plo Koon''s control of the Force is unmatched by most.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per game, may deploy a weapon here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While piloting, may battle regardless of objective restrictions. If a battle was just initiated here, may place your weapon here in Used Pile to make all non-vehicle weapon destiny draws -1.',
